errors.guild_only_command: This command can only be used in a server!

archive.no_archive_channel: There is no archive channel set! Please set one with `/set-archive`.
archive.archive_channel_deleted: The archive channel no longer exists. Please set one with `/set-archive`.
archive.only_archive_text: You can only archive text channels!

client.cant_send_archive: I don't have enough permissions to send messages in {{channel}}! Please make sure I have `Send Messages`, `Embed Links` and `Attach Files`.
client.cant_delete: I don't have enough permissions to delete {{- channel}}.

user.no_perms: You don't have the necessary permissions to archive {{- channel}}.

errors.text_only: The archive channel must be a text channel!

set_archive.none_set: There is no configured archive channel log.
set_archive.currently_set: Exported channels are currently being posted in {{- channel}}.
set_archive.successfuly_set: Successfully set the archived channel log to {{- channel}}.

user.cant_set: You don't have the necessary permissions to configure the archive channel.

invited.description: Hey there, I'm {{client_name}}! Thanks for inviting me to your sever. For more information on how to archive your channels, run `/guide`!
